short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make websites more accessible for people with colour vision deficiencies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Color Vision Deficiency Assistant is one of the first web extensions created by color blind people to help other color blind people navigate the web.

It is designed to be able to provide concrete help to people who have any type of color blindness, through a feature list born from in-depth user research.

The main features are:

- Highlight buttons
    - highlights all the interactable areas of the web page you are visiting, so that you can click exactly where you need to.
- Underline links
    - not every links on the internet are underlined, many only have a different color tone. Through this feature you can make any link underlined, in order to immediately perceive the contrast.

Among the features currently available there are:

- Emphasise (visited) links
- Force clear focus state
- Disable all styling

Color Vision Deficiency Assistant is in continuous development, with the mission of helping the colorblind community.
